page.title: 08A.1
page.content: The area is very quiet and there is only one busy road,it is the{A.1.} There are some other roads but the{ { A.1.}is the busiest.All kinds of traffic go on it including,cars, lorries,trucks and buses.There are many accidents.The{A.1.}leads from London to the North it used to go behind the{Bridge Inn}but was diverted a few years ago.The whole of the{A.1.} is a dual carriageway.It is very busy. Usually it is a quicker way to get to places.There are plans to improve it. There will soon be a flyover to make it safer to cross.There are fields on both sides of the{A.1.}Over the hedge there are some houses.The{A.1.}forms a bridge across the river{Nidd.}There is a{Bridge Inn}on the side of the{A.1.} It provides meals and drinks now but it used to be a coaching inn.The{A.1. has two lanes going either way.It is
